summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on March 20, 2010. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be attorney-client privileged and is intended solely for the recipient. The email emphasizes the prohibition of unauthorized use or disclosure of its contents.
